result.title: Strategic Standardisation Roadmap Results With Inputs For Standardisation Activities
result.description: Linked to T9.4. Provides the Strategic standardisation roadmap results with inputs for standardisation activities for the CircThread projects including as outcomes: the task will describe based on the learnings from the CircThread project recommendations for new standards and an initial roadmap for their development, focusing on the standardisation of Circular Economy requirements for products and their accounting, and Product Information Exchanges between actors. Based on the recommendations on the requirements to for new standards in relation to a Circular Economy in Europe the deliverable is marked as contributing to policy issues/recommendations.

result.title: Standardisation Toolkit V2 Online Interactive Tool & Report
result.description: Linked to T9.1. Provides the Standardisation Toolkit v2 online interactive tool & report for the CircThread projects including as outcomes: an updated overview of the interactive tool that includes the scan of existing standards, metrics, indicators and other tools relevant for circularity assessments, a summary of the library of relevant documents that are linked to the landscape scan, including emerging standards and approaches under development.The deliverable will include based on the landscape an initial evaluation of existing gaps in standards in relation to a Circular Economy in Europe and is marked as contributing to policy issues/recommendations.

result.title: Product Meta-Data Catalogue Structure for Linking Product Information
result.description: Linked to T41 Provides theProduct MetaData Catalogue Structure for linking product information for the CircThread projects including as outcomes describes he structure metadata items and the underlying semantic models for the information exchanges which combined provide for the vocabulary of the metadata product catalogue Metadata items in the catalogue tied to an individual product are described including an assssment for EEE Construction and Packaging for replicability purposes The data exchange needs for adaptation to the EU RMIS will be described The semantic models will be based on ontologies for product classifications The deliverable results will be implemented in the metadata catalogue service in T54

An oveview of the backend implementation of the data contracts usage service.

result.title: Circular Product Accounting Framework overview and Technical Description
result.description: Linked to T31 Provides a Circular Product Accounting Framework Overview and Technical Description for the CircThread projects including as outcomes a new accounting standard for product circularity in material flows and product qualityvalue looking at the current life cycle and next endofuse cycle It will be based on the Product Circularity Datasheets Standard PCDS to design algorithms for their automatic calculation given the appropriate data inputs are available including an assessment of data integration needs for the algorithms from different sources
